data.title: List of American films of 2008
data.text:
This is a list of American films released in 2008.

The highest-grossing American films released in 2008, by domestic box office gross revenue, are as follows:[1]

Highest-grossing films of 2008 Rank Title Distributor Domestic gross 1 The Dark Knight Warner Bros. $533,345,358 2 Iron Man Paramount $318,604,126 3 Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull $317,101,119 4 Hancock Sony $227,946,274 5 WALL-E Disney $223,808,164 6 Kung Fu Panda Paramount $215,434,591 7 Twilight Summit Entertainment $192,769,854 8 Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa Paramount $180,010,950 9 Quantum of Solace Sony $168,368,427 10 Horton Hears a Who! 20th Century Fox $154,529,439
